title: How do I report MMS Spam? (not SMS Spam)
content:
How to report a spam SMS is well documented.  How to report spam MMS is nowhere to be found...

It seems the spammers are now creating a large group (mostly around 19 people in my unfortunate experience) and sending an MMS spam message instead of an SMS spam message.  

There doesn't appear to be a way to report an MMS spam.  The options do not exist in any of the menus when dealing with a group message.

Does anyone know how to do this?  Is this just not supported?

My carrier is Verizon.

Thanks

-Mike
